rune.sacrifices: Sacrifice: -1xIronOre Notes: -The obelisk will stay standing for one day waiting for you. -Destroying the top block will cause it to go back down. -If you do not destroy the top block within a day, it will simply remain standing.
rune.description: Description: Creates a ride-able pillar to the sky. When it reaches the top, you can destroy the top block to send it back down.
